sentences.en: All disputes in connection with or in execution of contract shall be amicably settled through negotiations.
sentences.cn: 凡有关本合同或执行本合同一切争议应友好协商解决.

sentences.en: Chandragupta seems to have got the best of the encounter , but the affair ended amicably.
sentences.cn: 形势似乎对旃陀罗笈多很有利, 但最后双方却达成了和平协议.
你们是友好地分手 吗 ?

sentences.en: Generally speaking, we would like to resolve all disputes amicably by negotiations.
sentences.cn: 一般说来, 我们愿意通过友好的协商来解决争议.
他非常友善地接待了我们.

sentences.en: If the Parties amicably settled the Dispute bythemselves, they shall enter into a settlement agreement in writingand to be duly executed by the Parties.
sentences.cn: 如各方自行友善解决争议，各方应签订书面的解决协议并依约履行。

sentences.en: Our only choice in the matter is whether to accept it amicably, or be dragged, kicking and screaming, into the next chapter of our existence.
sentences.cn: 我们唯一能选择的是是否要友好地接受改变，亦或者被拖着，踢着尖叫着进入我们生活的新篇章。

sentences.en: She stood on the balcony, inexplicably mimicing him hiccuping, and amicably welcoming him in.
sentences.cn: 她站在阳台上, 莫名其妙地学他打起嗝来并热情地欢迎他进来.

sentences.en: Steering according to the wind, he also framed his words more amicably.
sentences.cn: 他真会看风使舵,口吻也马上变得温和了.

sentences.en: The ambience also delighted King, and they talked amicably through nine courses and three hours.
sentences.cn: 幽雅的环境也使“国王”心旷神怡.在总共九道菜,长达三个小时的晚餐过程中, 他们一直友好地交谈着.
这对夫妻客气地分手了.

sentences.en: The vast majority of disputes are settled amicably.
sentences.cn: 绝大多数争端都得到了友好解决.

sentences.en: They lived together amicably for several years.
sentences.cn: 他们在一起和睦地生活了好几年.

sentences.en: Transmit following to Mitsubishi firm chemical Dept case settled amicably already.
sentences.cn: 请转告三井公司化学部,此事已获圆满解决.

sentences.en: We are so glad to have settled the case so amicably.
sentences.cn: 我们对友好地解决这一事件感到高兴.

sentences.en: We eyed each other amicably if doubtfully.
sentences.cn: 我们彼此用一种怀疑的,但却友好的眼光看待对方.
